scripts.build: next build && npm run fix-css && mv out docs
scripts.build:static: cp next.config.prod.js next.config.js && next build && git checkout next.config.js
scripts.build:debug: rm -rf docs .next out && NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH='/daily-focus' next build && mkdir -p docs && cp -r out/* docs/ && node verify-paths.js && ls -la docs/ && git add docs/ && git commit -m 'Update static build' && git push
